title: Surya the Time-Leaping Pirate
hook: Join Surya, the daring pirate in Fora Jungle, as he embarks on a mystical adventure through time!
moral: With courage and kindness, you can solve any problem.
paragraphs: Once in the mystical Fora Jungle lived Surya, a spirited pirate with the ability to leap through time.
Known for his bravery and quick thinking, Surya roamed the jungle in search of magical treasures.
One day, Surya stumbled upon a village where the villagers were troubled by a mysterious shadow that stole their sunlight.
"Fear not, dear villagers! I shall use my time-leaping powers to uncover the truth," Surya declared with determination.
By leaping back in time, he discovered that the shadow was actually a mischievous cloud playing tricks on the sun.
With a clever plan, Surya convinced the cloud to stop its pranks and let the sunlight shine on the village once more.

en-pt.title: Surya o Pirata que Pula no Tempo
en-pt.moral: Com coragem e bondade, você consegue resolver qualquer problema.
en-pt.hook: Junte-se a Surya, o corajoso pirata na Floresta Fora, enquanto ele embarca em uma aventura mística através do tempo!
paragraphs:
Era uma vez, na misteriosa Floresta de Fora, vivia Surya, um pirata cheio de energia com o poder de pular no tempo.
Conhecido pela sua coragem e pensamento rápido, Surya explorava a selva em busca de tesouros mágicos.
Certo dia, Surya encontrou uma vila onde os moradores estavam preocupados com uma sombra misteriosa que roubava a luz do sol deles.
"Não tenham medo, queridos moradores! Irei usar meus poderes de pular no tempo para descobrir a verdade", declarou Surya com determinação.
Pulando para trás no tempo, ele descobriu que a sombra na verdade era uma nuvem travessa brincando de pegar o sol.
Com um plano inteligente, Surya convenceu a nuvem a parar de fazer travessuras e deixar a luz do sol brilhar na vila mais uma vez.

id-en.hook: Join Surya, the daring pirate in Fora Jungle, as he embarks on a mystical adventure through time!
id-en.moral: With courage and kindness, you can solve any problem.
id-en.title: Surya the Time-Leaping Pirate
paragraphs:
Once in the magical Fora Jungle, there was a brave pirate named Surya, who could jump through time.
Surya, a brave and smart boy, walked in the forest looking for special treasures.
One sunny day, Surya found a small town. The people living there were upset because a strange shadow took away their sunshine.
"Don't worry, my dear village friends! I will use my magic powers to find out what's true," Surya said bravely.
He went back to the olden days and found out that the dark shape was a playful cloud fooling around with the bright star.
With a smart idea, Surya made the cloud stop being naughty and allowed the sunshine to brighten the village again.

en-de.title: Surya der Zeit-Sprung-Pirat
en-de.moral: Wenn du mutig und nett bist, kannst du jedes Problem lösen.
en-de.hook: Begleite Surya, den mutigen Piraten im Fora Jungle, während er ein zauberhaftes Abenteuer durch die Zeit beginnt!
paragraphs:
In dem zauberhaften Fora Dschungel wohnte Surya, ein aufgeweckter Pirat mit der Fähigkeit, durch die Zeit zu springen.
Surya war sehr mutig und klug. Er lief durch den Dschungel, um magische Schätze zu finden.
Einmal stolperte Surya über ein Dorf, in dem die Dorfbewohner von einem geheimnisvollen Schatten, der ihnen ihr Sonnenlicht stahl, beunruhigt waren.
"Fürchte dich nicht, liebe Dorfbewohner! Ich werde meine Zeitreise-Kräfte einsetzen, um die Wahrheit aufzudecken", erklärte Surya entschlossen.
Als er zurück in die Vergangenheit sprang, entdeckte er, dass der Schatten tatsächlich eine schelmische Wolke war, die der Sonne Streiche spielte.
Mit einem schlauen Plan überzeugte Surya die Wolke, ihre Streiche einzustellen und die Sonne wieder auf das Dorf scheinen zu lassen.

en-fr.title: Surya la pirate qui saute à travers le temps
en-fr.moral: Avec courage et gentillesse, tu peux résoudre n'importe quel problème.
en-fr.hook: Rejoins Surya, le courageux pirate dans la jungle de Fora, alors qu'il se lance dans une aventure magique à travers le temps !
paragraphs:
Il était une fois dans la mystérieuse jungle de Fora Surya, un pirate plein d'énergie avec la capacité de sauter à travers le temps.
Connue pour sa bravoure et sa réflexion rapide, Surya arpentait la jungle à la recherche de trésors magiques.
Un jour, Surya a découvert un village où les habitants étaient embêtés par une ombre mystérieuse qui volait leur lumière du soleil.
"Ne crains rien, chers villageois! Je vais utiliser mes pouvoirs de saut dans le temps pour découvrir la vérité", déclara Surya avec détermination.
En sautant dans le temps, il a découvert que l'ombre était en fait un nuage espiègle jouant des tours au soleil.
Avec un plan astucieux, Surya a convaincu le nuage d'arrêter ses farces et de laisser la lumière du soleil briller sur le village une nouvelle fois.
